column4: Hi guys.. one quick question.. How come I can login to root form the login screen but I can sudo bash and authenticate as root? I'm on natty
Hi guys.. one quick question.. How come I CAN'T** login to root form the login screen but I can sudo bash and authenticate as root? I'm on natty
There is no root password. Sudo does not make you root, it just grants elevated privileges temporarily.
Correct. There is no root password for  you to log on with.
Except more effective at privilege control.
you may have to register on the network to get into #php. Ask in #freenode about how to do that.
Thanks for the tip  but im already registered on freenode and still cannot get in so I wonder why?
have you registered as being online since joining?
No I don't think i"m banned because each time I try to join it keeps telling me #php: Cannot join channel (+i) - you must be invited
